title: Highly Rated Premium International Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, July 9, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an exclusive tasting of highly rated, premium wines from around the world. This international lineup features bold reds from Australia, Argentina, Italy, and France—all critically acclaimed and perfect for collectors and curious palates alike.

Tasting Fee: $45 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Penfolds Bin 389 Cabernet-Shiraz 2022 (Australia) – 94 pts, Wine Spectator. Plush and seamless with chocolate, cherry, cocoa, and cigar box notes on a velvety finish.

• Banfi Magna Cum Laude 2021 (Italy) – 95 pts, Wine Spectator. A supple, harmonious blend of black currant, violet, and graphite with great energy and length.

• Vina Cobos Bramare Malbec 2022 (Argentina) – 95 pts, James Suckling. Intense and structured with cocoa, blueberry, spearmint, and dark chocolate wrapped in fine tannins.

• Vignobles Brunier Piedlong Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2022 (France) – 95 pts, Robert Parker. Silky and expressive with alpine strawberry, garrigue, spice, and bright acidity on a long finish.

Taste across continents with this standout flight—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
